remarks: Version of ~ drnf2 with a dv condition, which does not require ~ ax-13 .  Could be labelled "nfbidv".  (Contributed by BJ, 17-Jun-2019.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
bj-drnf2v.1 $e |- ( A. x x = y -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
bj-drnf2v $p |- ( A. x x = y -> ( F/ z ph <-> F/ z ps ) ) $.
$d x y z $.
